message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value representing costs incurred to secure customer orders and deliver goods/services to customers.

Looking at the income statement, I can see various expense categories. The most relevant line item for costs associated with securing customer orders and delivering goods/services would be "Selling Expenses". This category typically includes sales commissions, advertising, marketing, and other costs directly related to selling activities.

In the income statement provided, I can see:
- Selling Expenses: 627,729.56

This is the specific line item that represents the costs incurred to secure customer orders and deliver goods and services to customers.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '627729.56'} }
```
